story_07_04000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Argh! I couldn’t beat you...
Guess I’m still not good enough...
story_07_04000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Don’t be too hard on yourself. It’s been a long
time since someone pushed me like that
in battle. Believe in yourself.
story_07_04000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Is that you, Brendan?
What brings you all the way out here?
story_07_04000/2401_1001_0600_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m guessing you
came here for the same reason I did.
story_07_04000/2401_1001_0700_10: Oh, I’m so relieved. Looks like you guys are fine.
story_07_04000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Oh, it’s nothing—as long as you’re safe. More
importantly, I’ve brought you another challenger.
story_07_04000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Nice to meet you. I’m Norman. I’m Brendan’s
dad and currently a PML Leader.
story_07_04000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I like that look in your eyes. We just might be
able to have as wonderful a battle as I had
with Paulo!
story_07_04000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Go for it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Watch out
for my dad’s Slaking. He’s amazingly strong!
story_07_04000/2401_1001_1400_10:
I just lost to him...
It still kind of stings, to be honest.
story_07_04000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Your friend’s right—you definitely shouldn’t
underestimate Norman and his Slaking.
Good luck!
story_07_04000/2401_1001_1600_10: It looks like you’re ready for battle.
story_07_04000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Now show me how well you’ve trained
your Pokémon!
